typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Animal as string,
		Colour as string,
		Age as string,
		Visits as (Reason as string, Date as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> source1
source1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
